automating-common-veracode-platform-task.name: Veracode_Delete_Sandbox
automating-common-veracode-platform-task.description: A simple example script to delete a Sandbox if it exists in a Veracode application profile and you have the appropriate permissions.

automating-common-veracode-platform-task.name: Check Build Status
automating-common-veracode-platform-task.description: Script to check if an application profile in Veracode has a build running currently.  It also provides an option to delete the build if there is one running.

automating-common-veracode-platform-task.name: Check Pass Fail
automating-common-veracode-platform-task.description: A simple example script to check pass/fail status of a Veracode app profile (or sandbox) or for a list of app profiles with out sandboxes.

automating-common-veracode-platform-task.name: VcodeAutoMitigate
automating-common-veracode-platform-task.description: Command line app that mitigates flaws in Veracode based on CWE, scan type, and specific text in the description.

automating-common-veracode-platform-task.name: VcodeMitigationExpire
automating-common-veracode-platform-task.description: Utility designed to be run on a regular cadence (e.g., weekly cron job) to expire mitigations. The types of mitigations, expiration references, and other settings are controlled in a JSON config file.

automating-common-veracode-platform-task.name: Veracode Break the Build by Severity
automating-common-veracode-platform-task.description: This project contains three python scripts useful for working with Veracode projects in a build pipeline to break the build if any findings of a given severity or higher are found.

automating-common-veracode-platform-task.name: Veracode Mitigation Copier
automating-common-veracode-platform-task.description: Copies mitigations from one Veracode profile to another if it's the same flaw based on the following flaw attributes: issueid, cweid, type, sourcefile, and line. The script will copy all proposed and accepted mitigations for the flaw. The script will skip a flaw in the copy_to build if it already has an accepted mitigation.

automating-common-veracode-platform-task.name: Veracode PDF Reports
automating-common-veracode-platform-task.description: Pulls latest PDF reports from Veracode for recent Static and Dynamic scans.

automating-common-veracode-platform-task.name: Veracode Policy Examples
automating-common-veracode-platform-task.description: A collection of example application security "policies as code" that can be added to your Veracode organization account.

automating-common-veracode-platform-task.name: Veracode Sandbox Mitigated Unique Findings
automating-common-veracode-platform-task.description: This script will pull all open findings across all sandboxes for all applications and calculate which mitigated (proposed, accepted, or rejected) findings only exist in a single sandbox, and therefore may be deleted when the sandbox is deleted.

automating-common-veracode-platform-task.name: Veracode Scan Counts
automating-common-veracode-platform-task.description: Identify Veracode application profiles with one or more static scans in an incomplete state.

automating-common-veracode-platform-task.name: Veracode Workspace Auto Create
automating-common-veracode-platform-task.description: Uses the Veracode Agent Based Scan API and other Veracode REST APIs to automatically create a workspace for application profiles in a Veracode organization.

automating-common-veracode-platform-task.name: Veracode Delete Sandboxes via Threshold
automating-common-veracode-platform-task.description: Java Script that will automatically delete Sandboxes from a profile via a configured threshold and the number of Sandboxes to be deleted.
